languages.text: "Если такое случится, я первым подниму чашу за гордое имя сей смертоносной стаи".
"If it comes to pass, I will be the first to raise a cup to the proud name of that ferocious pack."
languages.original_text: "Если такое случится, я первым подниму чашу за гордое имя сей смертоносной стаи".

traits.locale_text: "If it comes to pass, I will be the first to raise a cup to the proud name of this ferocious pack."

languages.text: “如果他真的战胜了灾啸，我愿意第一个举起酒杯，为这个凶猛的狼群欢呼。”
languages.original_text: "If it comes to pass, I will be the first to raise a cup to the proud name of that ferocious pack."

traits.locale_text: “如果他真的战胜了灾啸，我愿意第一个举起酒杯，为这个凶猛的狼群欢呼。”
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Ranged

languages.text: « S'il devait y arriver, je serais le premier à trinquer pour saluer le fier nom de cette meute féroce. »
languages.original_text: "If it comes to pass, I will be the first to raise a cup to the proud name of that ferocious pack."

traits.locale_text: « S'il devait y arriver, je serais le premier à trinquer pour saluer le fier nom de cette meute féroce. »
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Ranged

languages.text: 「もしそれが実現すれば、俺はこの獰猛な群れの誇り高き名を叫びながら真っ先に杯を掲げるだろう」
languages.original_text: "If it comes to pass, I will be the first to raise a cup to the proud name of that ferocious pack."

traits.locale_text: 「もしそれが実現すれば、俺はこの獰猛な群れの誇り高き名を叫びながら真っ先に杯を掲げるだろう」
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Ranged

languages.text: «Si se diera el caso, seré el primero en levantar mi copa en honor de esa orgullosa jauría».
languages.original_text: "If it comes to pass, I will be the first to raise a cup to the proud name of that ferocious pack."

traits.locale_text: «Si se diera el caso, seré el primero en levantar mi copa en honor de esa orgullosa jauría».
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Ranged

languages.text: "Wenn es dazu kommt, werde ich als Erster einen Kelch erheben, um auf den stolzen Namen dieses wilden Rudels anzustoßen."
languages.original_text: "If it comes to pass, I will be the first to raise a cup to the proud name of that ferocious pack."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn es dazu kommt, werde ich als Erster einen Kelch erheben, um auf den stolzen Namen dieses wilden Rudels anzustoßen."
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Ranged

languages.text: "Bu vuku bulursa o azman sürünün şerefine ilk ben kadeh kaldırırım."
languages.original_text: "If it comes to pass, I will be the first to raise a cup to the proud name of that ferocious pack."
